title: Ravichandran Ashwin

coverImg.altText: Ravichandran Ashwin receives an award from VVS Laxman at the 2014 CEAT Cricket Ratings Award.

summary: Ravichandran Ashwin (About this soundpronunciation (helpÂ·info); born 17 September 1986) is an Indian international cricketer. A Bowler who bats right-handed and bowls right-arm off break, Ashwin plays for Tamil Nadu in domestic cricket and captains Kings XI Punjab in the Indian Premier League
